name: Wetris
description:
I wanted to play regular ol' Tetris but couldn't find a version I liked, so I created my own! 

This is a more relaxed style, the drop speed never goes up so you can stay in a meditative, rainy-day state. :-)

I will update the game, fix bugs, etc. as time goes on, but for now it's a playable version for your enjoyment! <3

Bug list so far: 

  • Scores may not update on first play. Quit and start over, should work
  • High score doesn't update in real-time
  • Score doesn't always update accurately - 100 points regardless of number of rows cleared
  • Occasionally full rows will not clear

Please let me know if there are any other bugs you find or suggestions for the next version. Thanks for playing!
